Articles.Content:
i don't know what APC's are, but trucks and tanks are fine.

also if you want to know what kind of craft i make you can go to my youtube channel.

here:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnKdW-BR4EPSvTCSNLH-hiw

APC stands for Armored Personel Carrier.

And thanks, i have a few to upload.

My first one looks cooler, but it doesn't quite work...

I am going to make one without BD armory, but hey, it looks WAY cooler with a tank turret.

can anyone help me with photos? i can seem to upload em... thx.

can anyone help me with photos? i can seem to upload em... thx.

PS: if you can figure it out and don't want to tell me how heres the craft file done wrong. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/webkit-fake-url://af89f4e8-0ebe-4cf2-b8ae-640c3c29e380/application.pdf/Applications/KSP/saves/test site/Ships/SPH/APC MARK TWO.craft

I use imgur.

To embed them do this:

[noparse][/noparse]

That gives you this:

- - - Updated - - -

To make albums, copy the url of the album: http://imgur.com/a/ogjga#0 then use only the underlined part http://imgur.com/a/ogjga#0

Then use [noparse]

Javascript is disabled. View full album
[/noparse] like this:

[noparse]

Javascript is disabled. View full album
[/noparse]

Which gives you this:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

- - - Updated - - -

For info head over to my thread:http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/113844-The-great-forum-test-thread!

For uploading craft files you can use KerbalX or any other file sharing site.

Edited April 4, 2015 by Mad Rocket Scientist

New fighters have arrived at the K.S.S Florus!

two small Fire Ant fighters...

and a commanding Space-ÃƒÅ¸.
Someones need to make a Mun-Sized death star!
FreeWill Inc. newest line of battle cruisers, Rook class. This ones orbiting Ike.

FreeWill Inc. newest line of battle cruisers, Rook class. This ones orbiting Ike.

http://i.imgur.com/jRARsq5.png

http://i.imgur.com/78I0COz.png

they look rather impressive

They are a sturdy Craft. I've been having problems with logistics in the development of my other ships. They seen to not have the range I need, but the Rook class has a ton of fuel and is very efficient. Right now its the best and most functional cruiser I have.

It still has not gone through the crucible of battle, so I have yet to see its performance in combat.

They are a sturdy Craft. I've been having problems with logistics in the development of my other ships. They seen to not have the range I need, but the Rook class has a ton of fuel and is very efficient. Right now its the best and most functional cruiser I have.

It still has not gone through the crucible of battle, so I have yet to see its performance in combat.

If you'd like, once I've got 1.0 up and running, I'll do some live-fire tests on your ships.

If you'd like, once I've got 1.0 up and running, I'll do some live-fire tests on your ships.

Sure that would be awesome! I've got 1.0 up and running so I'll be tweaking the ship and probably building a new launcher for it, after that I'll gladly send you the craft file.

Sure that would be awesome! I've got 1.0 up and running so I'll be tweaking the ship and probably building a new launcher for it, after that I'll gladly send you the craft file.

Wonderful! I'll prep my ships, since I know which ones will survive 1.0. Also, LV-Ns are now pure LF-fueled.

Just a new Tutorial video on my channel...

i thought people here might be interested in it...:

Lets hope that this works... anyway, I'm gonna start work on my new Kerbals At War series as soon as my computer will accept the update. In the mean time I have a few smaller ships like corvettes and frigates.

This is my latest Corvette, I will have a ship classing image for all of my builds later for reference. This Corvette is Designed as cannon fodder. However it does pack a couple of unguided missiles to take out other ships. It has light armor and weighs about as much as an orange tank of fuel. Ill try to upload links to these builds as I do them if you wish.

This is a side image of the launch stage i made for it. As you can see it just uses an orange tank as ballast. Its a little ineffective and non reliable, so I will try to fix it later.
Somebody make a kinetic bombardment system!
Back up and running.

Decided to rebuild the first warship I ever made with all the new parts. Its not been updated since 0.19!

It still obsolete simply due to the entire construction technique being outdated, though still a massive improvement on the original.
I just swapped the Nukes on my cannon ship for a Skipper and it still has more range than a DrekXD Mun round trip.

I just swapped the Nukes on my cannon ship for a Skipper and it still has more range than a DrekXD Mun round trip.

Tempted to swap out for chemical engines as well. They seem to get more range on ships like ours.

Tempted to swap out for chemical engines as well. They seem to get more range on ships like ours.

That's because we have the space to make the sacrifice. About double fuel means half ISP balances out and a bit more.

Hmmm. I have to say that no longer needing oxidiser seems to be the saving grace of the new LV-N. My larger ships are having their weight halved by removing it and so are only needing half the engines, further reducing their weight while keeping the same TWR.

I'm managing 2 1/2 min burns so far in the sunlight.

HELP NEEDED

please provide me with a stock, no cheats way to get this into orbit.

PLZ help i know it is possible because I've launched other larger ones in .90 !!!

i'll post a download if i get it into orbit.

- - - Updated - - -

Lets hope that this works... anyway, I'm gonna start work on my new Kerbals At War series as soon as my computer will accept the update. In the mean time I have a few smaller ships like corvettes and frigates.

This is my latest Corvette, I will have a ship classing image for all of my builds later for reference. This Corvette is Designed as cannon fodder. However it does pack a couple of unguided missiles to take out other ships. It has light armor and weighs about as much as an orange tank of fuel. Ill try to upload links to these builds as I do them if you wish.

This is a side image of the launch stage i made for it. As you can see it just uses an orange tank as ballast. Its a little ineffective and non reliable, so I will try to fix it later.

NICE!!!

is that 1.0, 'cause I've found large ships very hard to get into orbit in 1.0

Edited April 30, 2015 by 8bitgammers

No, it's the update RIGHT before the new release. I didn't even find out until today... I will update and post the craft file once I update my game. I feel so ashamed of myself for not knowing about the update. PS: I need names for the factions in my kerbals at war," and am now taking any design I can. Last thing is that I am gonna try to upload as many ships and videos as I can as soon as I can. I'll try to make a trailer later today.

Last thing is that I am gonna try to upload as many ships and videos as I can as soon as I can. I'll try to make a trailer later today.

I decided to make 3 different Factions. my current names are as follows: Arcain Republic, The Shlovik Union, and the United Bolhevian States. These are subject to change though.
